title: (Fri Full Show) We Talk To Shark Tank's Barbara Corcoran and Pitch Her Our Business Ideas + Chad Kroeger From Nickelback Is On and Eddy Asks Him a Big Question + Gender Reveal Advice
itunes:title: (Fri Full Show) We Talk To Shark Tank's Barbara Corcoran and Pitch Her Our Business Ideas + Chad Kroeger From Nickelback Is On and Eddy Asks Him a Big Question + Gender Reveal Advice
description:
We talk to Barbra Corcoran from Shark Tank and she answers some important business and real estate questions for us. And we pitch her our business ideas and see if she accepts any. Plus, Chad Kroeger, the lead singer of Nickleback, is on the show! He talks about their music and the success of their song "Rockstar." And Eddie asks him a big question! Then, we help a listener who is expecting their third child and does not want to have a huge gender reveal party, but their family and friends do.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
